&dhpackage; set of bash libraries
DESCRIPTION
&dhpackage; is a package that includes libraries of the tested code ready for a reuse:
- libstd.sh
functions for handling temp objects (file, folder, job), autocleaning, validations, exceptions
- liblog.sh
debug level, logging routines
- libpid.sh
process running control
- libcnf.sh
active configuration files control
- libopt.sh
command line options manipulations
- libini.sh
ini configuration files control
- libmd5.sh
get md5sum for file(s)
- libxml.sh
xml code generation
